title: 277: CHATTY BROS: Craig Conant & Truth or Dare
itunes:title: 277: CHATTY BROS: Craig Conant & Truth or Dare
description:
NSFW! We repeat this episode is not safe for work;)…because The Bros are joined by the #broadsquad’s favorite comedian, Craig Conant, and it gets wild! Join The Bros and Craig as they take on truth or dares sent in by the Broad Squad!

***The Bros will be back to recapping Katie’s season of the Bachelorette on their next episode!

CRAIG CONANT:

***Follow Craig on Instagram: @craigpconant

***Listen to his podcast “Community Service w/ Craig Conant": https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/community-service-with-craig-conant/id1441475405

***Check out Craig’s Stand Up Comedy Dates here: https://craigconant.com/#tour

***Purchase Craig’s merch here: https://craigconantstore.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 

***RELIEFBAND: go to RELIEFBAND.COM and use promo code CHATTY to receive 20% off plus free shipping!

 ***DIPSEA: get an extended 30-day free trial when you go to DIPSEASTORIES.COM/CHATTY

***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY100 and use code CHATTY100 to get $100 off including free shipping!

***EMBARK: Go to EMBARKVET.COM to get free shipping and save $50 off your Embark Breed and Health kit with promo code CHATTY

***CUYANA: get $10 off your first order over $150 plus free shipping at CUYANA.COM/CHATTY

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
